Event.Keyword: Presentation Layer API Performance Scenario: First cloud notification with cloud image download Performance Scenario: New cloud notification refering cloud images arrives Performance Scenario: MoGo is panning with downloading cloud images
Event.Message: Image download is complete for a single URL: notification id [%1], resource id [%2], local path [%3], error code [%4], flags [%5]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ResourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LocalPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="Flag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Presentation Layer API Performance Scenario: First cloud notification with cloud image download Performance Scenario: New cloud notification refering cloud images arrives Performance Scenario: MoGo is panning with downloading cloud images Developer Support: End-to-End trace for new notification
Event.Message: Image download is complete for all URL with notification id [%1]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="URLComplete" count="Count"> <data name="ResourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LocalPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Keyword: Presentation Layer API Developer Support: End-to-End trace for new notification
Event.Message: Processing initial batch on Image request for toast: AppUserModelId [%1], Notification Id [%2], UrlCount [%3], Flags [%4]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="AppUserModelId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="URLCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Processing Toast Image request URL: Resource Id [%1], URL [%2]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Scheduling Image Download Task: [Slot Index] %1, [Notification Id] %2, [Priority] %3, [IsTile] %4, [URL] %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SlotIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BITSPriority" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IsTile" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Completed Image Download Task: [Notification Id] %1, [IsTile] %2, [Path] %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IsTile" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Presentation Layer API WNP Transport Layer
Event.Message: Download image has failed: [Notification Id] %1 [Tile] %2 [ErrorCode] %3 [URL] %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IsTile" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Image resource is being processed.
Image resource has been processed.
Clearing all tile notifiction is being processed.
Clearing all tile notifiction has been processed.
Clearing all images is being processed.
Clearing all images has been processed.
Image Download Manager policy is changed to %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IDM_Enabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Detail event for tile session %1 update.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="UpdateControl" count="Count"> <data name="AppUserModelId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Message: Detail event at start of Notification Request performance tracking.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="RequestControl" count="Count"> <data name="AppUserModelId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NumNotification" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </struct> </template>
